sentences.sentence: Brothels, she insists, are the acceptable face of prostitution.
sentences.translation: 妓院，她坚持说，是卖淫可接受的方面。

sentences.sentence: Even in brothels he wanted to monopolize because he had money.
sentences.translation: 逛暗娼他也想独占，因为他有钱。

sentences.sentence: Jimmy: You just have to look in the right places... brothels are good.
sentences.translation: 吉米：你只是要到合适的地方去看看…那些地方很不错。
